nouns.description: acumen (usually uncountable, plural acumens or acumina)

entries.meaning: Quickness of perception or discernment; penetration of mind; the faculty of nice discrimination.
examples: Synonyms: sharpness, penetration, keenness, shrewdness, acuteness, acuity, wit, foxiness, intelligence, canniness

entries.meaning: (botany) A sharp, tapering point extending from a plant.
(anatomy) A bony, often sharp, protuberance, especially that of the ischium.
